name: Just a Speed Game
description:
The theme of this game matches the theme of the game jam. IT'S RAW. What I mean by raw is raw graphics, raw audio, straightforward gameplay. Simply put, everything is plain and literal. 

Tips & Tricks

Player speed is faster while jumping. Use shoot cancelling. Turn off sound if it's annoying.

Advanced Speedrun Tricks

After shooting the target on level 1, there is a 1 frame window to warp to level 2(press the shoot cancel button). After shooting the first target on level 5, there is a 1 frame window to warp to level 6. On level 9, every time you shoot a platform or wall, there is a 2% chance that you will warp to level 10. On level 10 get gud and don't choke.

Possible Updates

If you're interested in seeing more of this game and I decide to not be a lazy bum you should look out for these updates.

Integrated Speedrun Tips & Tricks

Achievements(ex. badges for completing the game at a certain time)

More Options

More Levels
